biotools.summary:
A graph regularized generalized matrix factorization model for predicting links in biomedical bipartite networks.

This code is the implementation of GRGMF, which is both CPU and CUDA compatible(CUDA is preferred).

bioschemas.name: GRGMF
bioschemas.summary:
A graph regularized generalized matrix factorization model for predicting links in biomedical bipartite networks.

This code is the implementation of GRGMF, which is both CPU and CUDA compatible(CUDA is preferred).
